name: cirsium muticum
description: Swamp Thistle produces vibrant purple to pink flowers and is weakly armed compared to other thistles. It is biennial but will re-seed in appropriate habitat. It is best grown in full sun to moderate shade on wet soils.
features: Pollinator Favorite: butterflies, bees and birds
Deer Resistant (Our experiences here in the Upper Midwest may vary in other regions; deer can respond differently to local conditions or seasonal variations.)
